ProximCloud: Exclusive Coupon Codes and Great Deals on London, UK-based Shared Hosting!

london, maindenhead, proximcloud, shared hosting, uk April 10, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

ProximCloud has been a standout shared hosting provider on LEB since they started posting offers with us in April 2020 – one year ago!  They were last on back in February 22, 2021 when we celebrated their third birthday.

  • This time they’re coming to us with a great exclusive coupon code, which lets you take 10-20% off (depending on package and billing cycle) their already low prices.  Woot!

These offers are in the Maidenhead datacenter in London, UK.  A little about this datacenter provided by ProximCloud:

“Our Maidenhead datacenter is situated on a purpose built site near the centre of the town.  The Maidenhead datacenter provides a total capacity of 1300 sq. mt. of high quality, resilient and secure space across 4 data halls. The UK facility offers diverse fiber routing via multiple carriers, Cross Connection to a number of Tier 1 carriers and redundant core switches and routers.”

ProximCloud‘s WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal.

If you want to get in on this deal, note that the LEB promo codes are good through April 30th.

Here’s a little about ProximCloud in their own words:

“ProximCloud is a small website hosting business, which has been in operation for over three years (since 28th Feb 2018), which has striven based on the reliability and low-cost factors of our services. ProximCloud always puts the customer first, and has ensured to provide our customers with many support-methods to ensure they can reach us when they need it, and when it suits them.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with ProximCloud.

Now read more to see the offers!

Promo Codes

  • All LEB customers are eligible to use the LEBAPRIL21 promotional code, this will provide you with a whopping 20% off our Deluxe, Ultra or Unlimited website hosting packages, on any billing cycle.
  • However, you can also use LEBAPRIL212 for 10% off our Essential Service on quarterly, semi-annual or annual billing cycles!

    Both offers are good through April 30.
